name: Sector 19 (2018)
description:
DESCRIPTION

Experience the claustrophobic and eerie atmosphere of Sector 19, a first-person horror demo inspired by SCP: Containment Breach.

PLEASE NOTE

This is a very small demo project: it is not finished, nor polished and very outdated (2018). A smooth experience is not guaranteed! Some assets from the SCP: Containment Breach have been used.
